DialogueText.Text: Hello again! I come bearing some news! I've learned more about what we need to perform the ritual. Though I'll be honest... This may be asking too much, even for you.

Old legends by the Monks state that the Dragon King used the power of "Primordial Light" to ultimately seal away the behemoth that had devestated the Dragons, and we'll need our own source of that power to fuel the ritual. You may think we're out of luck without the Dragon King, but fear not, there's another entity I know of that might allow us to harness this power: the self-appointed "Empress of Light".

She's a graceless despot; same as the Gods, and the world would be better off rid of her. How she of all beings came to wield the Dragon King's power is beyond my understanding, but I'm hopeful you'll discover the method by which she harnesses Primordial Light during your battle with her. That is, if you're willing to face her?

Wonderful! Should you emerge victorious, your name shall certainly be engraved in legend! I wish you luck in your hunt; the Empress can be most elusive, but I've heard rumors that she favors a special insect native to the Hallow. Perhaps that is a good lead to follow.
